Title: EM - Elections - Manage Measures End - to - End Scenario

Step Action: Manage Measures

1. Navigate to 'Search Election Measures' page from Election component 2. Enter Election Date Name3. Select one of the search criteria Election Type, Election Category, District Type, and District4. Click 'Search'
Step Expected: Election measures matching the search criteria are displayed

Step Action: 1. Navigate to 'Add Election Measure' page 2. Enter Election Date Name, Election Type, and Election Category3. Select Response Type, Region, District Type, and Districts 4. Enter Measure Pass Rate and Ballot Measure details 5. Click 'Save'
Step Expected: New election measure is successfully added and displayed in the system

Step Action: 1. Search for an existing election measure from the search election measures page 2. Modify details such as Measure Pass Rate, Ballot Measure Status, Order, and Description3. Click 'Save'
Step Expected: Changes are successfully saved and reflected in the system

Step Action: 1. Search for an existing election measure2. Modify details3. Click "Cancel"
Step Expected: Changes are discarded, and previous values remain unchanged

Step Action: 1. Attempt to save an election measure without filling required fields like Public Measure Title or Ballot Measure Description2. Click 'Save'
Step Expected: System displays appropriate validation messages

Step Action: 1. Search for an existing election measure2. Click 'Delete'3. Confirm deletion
Step Expected: Measure is removed from the system
